description: Wondering how to make chicken stock? This easy chicken stock recipe is ready in two steps. Use it to add flavour to soups and rice, and as a base for braising.
keywords: Stock & broth,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Mar 2021,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Homemade Chicken Stock Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.3kg chicken, whole (or 600g chicken bones or carcass)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, deep saucepan over medium heat. Add onion, carrot and celery, then cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until softened. Add chicken, peppercorns, bay leaf and 3 litres water and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 2 hours, skimming foam from surface. Allow to cool slightly.
Remove chicken or bones from pan. Shred chicken and store for another use. Strain stock, discarding solids. Season well with salt.
